      Story ServerManager.getById(java.util.UUID id)
      Calls searchById() in the ESRetrieval class to retrieve a story on the server by id.
      Story ServerManager.getRandom()
      Builds a string query to randomly sort stories on the server and retrieves a maximum of one to return (of there are no stories on the server, null will be returned).
